attributes.action: withdraw the Peerage offord to the Fomer Speaker of the House of Commons Michael Marten
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The former Speaker of the House of Commons has not earned the right to be elevated to the House of Lords. He failed in his duty to Parliament and to the people of this country by not putting a stop to the MP's expenses scandle and by trying to stop the publics right to see MP's expenses published

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
